title: Amazing Stories Volume 05 Number 03
creator: Sloane, Thomas O'Conor, 1851-1940
Verrill, Alpheus Hyatt, 1871-1954
Linn, Ralph
Campbell, John Wood, 1910-1971
Hamilton, Edmond Moore, 1904-1977
description: Amazing Stories, volume 5, number 3 (June 1930). Scanned copy of a pulp magazine published by Experimenter Publications, Inc. and edited by Thomas O'Conor Sloane, Ph.D. Periodical copyright not renewed. Individual contributions' copyrights not renewed. This magazine and its contents are now in the public domain. Featuring: The Non-Gravitational Vortex (A. Hyatt Verrill), Element 87 (Ralph Linn), Piracy Preferred (John W. Campbell, Jr.), and The Universe Wreckers (Edmond Hamilton; 2/3).
